metadata.synopsis: Adamantine forge: players have inserted mould into the mould chamber, mithral into the forge, clicked the lever to trigger the hammer and the platform went down. Now they click again on the forge/chamber expecting to get the result. However, they still need to add the lava. This PAD is a hint to the fact that something is still missing (or, after crafting once, that lava needs to be added).
